name: GetMeetingActivityLogs
description:
Retrieve a list of meeting activity logs from Zoom.

Use this tool to get a detailed history of meeting activities on Zoom. Ensure the meeting audit trail log feature is enabled on your account before using this tool.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date for the report in 'yyyy-MM-dd' format. Ensure the range with 'to' is only one month.

value_schema.description: The start date in 'yyyy-MM-dd'format. The date range defined by the `from` and `to` parameters should only be one month, as the report includes only one month's worth of data at once.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date for fetching meeting activity logs in 'yyyy-MM-dd' format. Must be within one month of the start date.

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of activity to filter logs. Options: All Activities, Meeting Created, Meeting Started, User Join, User Left, Remote Control, In-Meeting Chat, Meeting Ended.

value_schema.description:
Activity type. 
-1 - All activities. 
0 - Meeting created. 
1 - Meeting started. 
2 - User joined. 
3 - User left. 
4 - Remote control. 
5 - In-meeting chat. 
9 - Meeting ended.

parameters.name: number_of_records_per_call
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to be returned in a single API call. Adjust according to data needs and rate limits.

value_schema.description: The number of records to be returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token for paginating through large sets of results. Expires in 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: meeting_number
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Zoom meeting. Required to fetch activity logs.

parameters.name: operator_name_or_email
parameters.description: An operator's name or email used to filter the meeting activity logs.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start date in 'yyyy-MM-dd'format. The date range defined by the `from` and `to` parameters should only be one month, as the report includes only one month's worth of data at once.

value_schema.description: The start date in 'yyyy-MM-dd'format. The date range defined by the `from` and `to` parameters should only be one month, as the report includes only one month's worth of data at once.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records to be returned within a single API call.

value_schema.description: The number of records to be returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

parameters.description:
Activity type. 
-1 - All activities. 
0 - Meeting created. 
1 - Meeting started. 
2 - User joined. 
3 - User left. 
4 - Remote control. 
5 - In-meeting chat. 
9 - Meeting ended.

value_schema.description:
